Info

Defines class ExtInfrastructure with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an API for processing hyperlinks for splash screen.

class ats_utilities.splash.ext_infrastructure.ExtInfrastructure(prop: Dict[Any, Any], verbose: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: ATSChecker

Defines class ExtInfrastructure with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an API for processing hyperlinks for splash screen. API for GitHub information.

It defines:

attributes:
_verbose - Enable/Disable verbose option.
_property - Splash property in dict format.
methods:
__init__ - Initials ExtInfrastructure constructor.
get_info_text - Pre-processes info text.
get_issue_text - Pre-processes issue text.
get_author_text - Pre-processes author text.
get_author_text() → str[source]¶

Pre-processes author text for splash.

Returns:

Hyperlink with author info

Return type:

<str>

Exceptions:

None

get_info_text() → str[source]¶

Pre-processes info text for splash.

Returns:

Hyperlink with info text

Return type:

<str>

Exceptions:

None

get_issue_text() → str[source]¶

Pre-processes issue text for splash.

Returns:

Hyperlink with issue info

Return type:

<str>

Exceptions:

None
